pdf.head:
<#if .locale == "zh_CN">
<#elseif .locale == "zh_TW">
<#elseif .locale == "ja_JP">
<#elseif .locale == "ko_KR">
<#elseif .locale == "th_TH">
</#if>
pdf.body:
<#list records as check>




	${check.trandate}
	



	${check.entity}
	
<#if check.item?has_content || check.expense?has_content|| check.apply?has_content || check.credit?has_content>

<#list check.expense as expense>

	${expense.account}
	${expense.date}
	${expense.description}
	${expense.amount}
	
	</#list><#list check.item as item>
	

	 
	${item.date}
	${item.item}, ${item.description}
	${item.amount}
	
	</#list><#if check.apply?has_content><#list check.apply as apply><#assign x = apply_index></#list>
	

	Date
	Description
	Orig. Amt.
	Amt. Due
	Discount
	Amount
	
	<#list check.apply as apply>
<#if apply.disc?has_content>
	<#assign x = apply.total + apply.disc>
</#if>
	

	${apply.applydate}
	${apply.refnum}
	${apply.total}
	${apply.due}
	<#if apply.disc?has_content>${apply.discamt}</#if>
	${apply.amount}
	
	</#list></#if><#if check.credit?has_content><#list check.credit as credit>
	

	${credit.creditdate}
	${credit.type}
	${credit.refnum}
	${credit.due}
	${credit.disc}
	${credit.amount}
	
	</#list></#if>
  
</#if>



	${check.memo}
	



	${check.total}
	
  




  
    

      ${check.trandate}
      
    

  


  

      ***<#if (check.usertotal?length > 0)>${check.usertotal?replace("$", "")}<#else>${check.total?replace("$", "")}</#if>
      

  

      ${check.totalwords}*******
      

  

      ${check.address}
      
    

  
    

      
        

          
        
      
    
  






	${check.trandate}
	


  

	${check.entity}
  
  
<#if check.item?has_content || check.expense?has_content|| check.apply?has_content || check.credit?has_content>

<#list check.expense as expense>

	${expense.account}
	${expense.date}
	${expense.description}
	${expense.amount}
	
	</#list><#list check.item as item>
	

	 
	${item.date}
	${item.item}, ${item.description}
	${item.amount}
	
	</#list><#if check.apply?has_content><#list check.apply as apply><#assign x = apply_index></#list>
	

	Date
	Description
	Orig. Amt.
	Amt. Due
	Discount
	Amount
	
	<#list check.apply as apply>
<#if apply.disc?has_content>
	<#assign x = apply.total + apply.disc>
</#if>
	

	${apply.applydate}
	${apply.refnum}
	${apply.total}
	${apply.due}
    <#if apply.disc?has_content>${apply.discamt}</#if>
	${apply.amount}
	
	</#list></#if><#if check.credit?has_content><#list check.credit as credit>
	

	${credit.creditdate}
	${credit.type}
	${credit.refnum}
	${credit.due}
	${credit.disc}
	${credit.amount}
	
	</#list></#if>
</#if>



	${check.memo}
	



	${check.total}
	

  
</#list>
